name: House of number 76
description:
• Introduction:
A warning!!! This game is made to stop your heart. Average game duration is 40-50 minutes. Level of difficulty:7/10 Only the strongest can beat the game
  • Game characteristics:
A horror game. Friendly atmosphere and good graphics. The game will scare you to the shivers. Full HD graphics.
  • The plot of the game:
The Wilson family were mysteriously murdered. You must investigate crime scenes. And we must find out what will happen next...
  • Recommendations: We recommend you put on headphones before playing to feel the atmospheric air. Good luck to you. Don't forget to rate the game)
[Totally minimum requirements] (Potato PC settings) [Testing in progress] Processor: i3 3220 3.3 GHz / AMD Athlon II X4 555 Graphics Card: GTX 260 / ATI Radeon HD 4850 Ram: 2 GB Hard Drive Space: 1 GB System: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10 /  [Recommended setup] (Master PC settings) [Testing in progress] Processor: i5 2500K 3.3 GHz / Ryzen 3 3100 Graphics card: GTX 480-Ti / RX 460 Ram: 4 GB Hard Drive Space: 1 GB System: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10 / / Control:
  • You can play with a joystick. We tried to make you feel comfortable in the game)
Control: WASD Run: Shift  Take something: E Inventory:  Tab Sit: C Turns: X Y Look at something: Q Pick up a flashlight: 1 2 Demo version:https://ek-game.itch.io/house-of-number-76-demo
